title: Kenilworth Park & Aquatic Gardens: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Volunteer  Looking to get involved and volunteer with others in a National Park? Come volunteer at Kenilworth Aquatic Gardens where we have many volunteer opportunities available including gardening, working in the green house, cleaning and prepping tools, invasive plant removal and clean-ups!   Whether you want a niche for yourself with an individual project, or to work with a large group, you can meet your goals at Kenilworth Aquatic Gardens.   Contact Gardener Supervisor, Doug Rowley at (202) 692-6075.   For upcoming volunteer opportunities and a calendar of events please visit Friends of Kenilworth Aquatic Gardens.
